DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY ; POLITICS : SPEECH ON N . IRELAND CONFLICT
DOC.TEXT: Patrick Shannon is scheduled to speak on the Anglo-Irish conflict and the prospects for peace at 7 p.m. Saturday at the Midnight Special Bookstore in Santa Monica . The 29-year-old Belfast native , who holds a master ' s degree in Irish political studies from Queen ' s University in Belfast , will analyze the conflict and discuss recent contacts between the_British government and the_Irish Republican Army . An open discussion will follow the talk . The bookstore is at 1318 Third Street Promenade . Information : ( 310 ) 393-2923 .
